page.title: 09 Shopping Survey
page.content: Leven High Street is very popular with shoppers.One Friday six of us did a shopping survey.We found that only 25% lived in Leven. Of the 57% who came by bus 61% found the bus service good enough.43% came by car. Of these, 64% said there were enough parking spaces. We also found that 44% came more than once a week mostly to food shops. 57% didn't think there was a good enough variety of shops.Some people wanted things changed.More chain stores like C&A or Marks and Spencers. More childrens clothes shops and supermarkets.Most of the younger folk wanted a leisure centre and a swimming pool. Whereas the older people wanted Leven to look like it was before the roads were dug up and the shops were renovated. Of all we interviewed only one person liked it as it was.
